is"},{"lineNumber":109639,"originalJapaneseLine":"　デートとは言わん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"not something you call a date!\""},{"lineNumber":109640,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……カラーにその辺りの","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...It's difficult to tell Kala about women.\""},{"lineNumber":109642,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おーい、クレープ屋まだ残ってたぞー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, the crepe stand is still crepe!\""},{"lineNumber":109644,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……重畳」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Excellent.\""},{"lineNumber":109645,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んじゃ、これを……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well <Ding~~~>"},{"lineNumber":109654,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……まあ、そうなるな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Well, that was bound to happen.\""},{"lineNumber":109655,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":109656,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":109657,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、満喫した」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, I enjoyed it.\""},{"lineNumber":109658,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……では帰るか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Well then, shall we go home?\""},{"lineNumber":109659,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、もういいのか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, is it over already?"},{"lineNumber":109660,"originalJapaneseLine":"　三十分ばかし二人でぶらぶらしただけだぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"We just strolled around together for about thirty minutes.\""},{"lineNumber":109661,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私はデートというものをしたかっただけ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I just wanted to experience what a date is."},{"lineNumber":109662,"originalJapaneseLine":"　総統閣下の時間をこれ以上","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't take up any more of your Excellency's time.\""},{"lineNumber":109663,"originalJapaneseLine":"　奪うわけにはいかない」","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":109664,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何も聞かずワガママに付き合ってくれたこと、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I appreciate you indulging my selfishness without question."},{"lineNumber":109665,"originalJapaneseLine":"　感謝する」","translatedEnglishLine":"Thank you.\""},{"lineNumber":109666,"originalJapaneseLine":"「固い奴め」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're so serious.\""},{"lineNumber":109667,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、また急になんで","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But why did you suddenly say you wanted to go on a date again?\""},{"lineNumber":109668,"originalJapaneseLine":"　デートなんて言い出したんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":109669,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ふむ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmm."},{"lineNumber":109670,"originalJapaneseLine":"　婿殿になら言ってもいいか」","translatedEnglishLine":"May I tell my son-in-law?\""},{"lineNumber":109671,"originalJapaneseLine":"「理由は単純だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The reason is simple."},{"lineNumber":109672,"originalJapaneseLine":"　デートしたことがないから、","translatedEnglishLine":"Because I've never been on a date,"},{"lineNumber":109673,"originalJapaneseLine":"　してみたかった」","translatedEnglishLine":"I wanted to try it.\""},{"lineNumber":109674,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんだけ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's all?\""},{"lineNumber":109675,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes.\""},{"lineNumber":109676,"originalJapaneseLine":"「生前、私はその人生を","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In my lifetime, I devoted myself entirely"},{"lineNumber":109677,"originalJapaneseLine":"　カラーという種と村の為に全て費やした」","translatedEnglishLine":"to the Kala tribe and the village.\""},{"lineNumber":109678,"originalJapaneseLine":"「死後、こうして外に出られる機会を得たなら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"After death, now that I have the chance to go outside,"},{"lineNumber":109679,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これくらいのワガママはいいかと思った」","translatedEnglishLine":"I thought such a little selfishness would be fine.\""},{"lineNumber":109680,"originalJapaneseLine":"「誰とデートするかという話なら……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you're asking who I wanted to date..."},{"lineNumber":109681,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私は私の初めての相手となった婿殿がいい」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'd like my son-in-law, who became my first partner.\""},{"lineNumber":109682,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それだけの話だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's all there is to it.\""},{"lineNumber":109683,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ありがとう、今日はとても楽しかった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank you, today was very enjoyable.\""},{"lineNumber":109684,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"..........\""},{"lineNumber":109685,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よし、もう少しだけ延長だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, let's extend a little longer.\""},{"lineNumber":109686,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hm?\""},{"lineNumber":109687,"originalJapaneseLine":"「デートを知らんお固い女に、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"To a serious woman who doesn't know about dating,"},{"lineNumber":109688,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様がデートの真髄を教えてやる」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll teach the essence of dating.\""},{"lineNumber":109689,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、おい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, hey!\""},{"lineNumber":109690,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはビビッドを腕の中に","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance held Vivid in his arms"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では婿殿はデートのベテラン……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, my son-in-law is a dating veteran..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奴隷の子と常時デートしてる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You constantly go on dates with a slave child."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奴隷と一緒に出かけることは

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: not something you call a date!"
"...It's difficult to tell Kala about such

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男女の機微を理解しろと言われても困る」
「おーい、クレープ屋まだ残ってたぞー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, the crepe stand is still here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 良かったな、念願のクレープだぞ」
買ってきたクレープを
手渡そうとしたランスの動きが止まる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance stopped his movement to hand it over.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはクレープが汚れないよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, so the crepe wouldn't get dirty,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地面に置き、そっと両手を合わせた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: placed it on the ground and gently put his hands together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 三十分ばかし二人でぶらぶらしただけだぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We just strolled around together for about thirty minutes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私はデートというものをしたかっただけ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I just wanted to experience what a date is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統閣下の時間をこれ以上
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't take up any more of your Excellency's time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奪うわけにはいかない」
「何も聞かずワガママに付き合ってくれたこと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I appreciate you indulging my selfishness without question.
"But why did you suddenly say you wanted to go on a date again?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: デートなんて言い出したんだ？」
婿殿になら言ってもいいか」
デートしたことがないから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because I've never been on a date,
"In my lifetime, I devoted myself entirely

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カラーという種と村の為に全て費やした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to the Kala tribe and the village."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「死後、こうして外に出られる機会を得たなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After death, now that I have the chance to go outside,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これくらいのワガママはいいかと思った」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought such a little selfishness would be fine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰とデートするかという話なら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you're asking who I wanted to date...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は私の初めての相手となった婿殿がいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'd like my son-in-law, who became my first partner."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ありがとう、今日はとても楽しかった」
「デートを知らんお固い女に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To a serious woman who doesn't know about dating,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様がデートの真髄を教えてやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll teach the essence of dating."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはビビッドを腕の中に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance held Vivid in his arms

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
